title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8007.1 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8007.1 - General

State Regulations

Discharge of a releasee shall be as provided by law. Since
administrative procedures have been established for submission of appropriate
cases to the board as eligibility for discharge is reached, the board and
members of its staff shall not, under any circumstances, entertain requests for
such discharge from a releasee or from others on his behalf. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
8007.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
